Type.BattleDialog: Well, then… Shall I test your skills?
I wonder how big the Library has gotten.
Since we have the time, let’s slowly warm up.
I was hoping for more, but I guess you weren’t at that point yet…
That was pretty fun. Buuut… I guess you aren’t quite there yet.
Good… You’re growing strong, slowly but steadily.
You still haven’t figured yourself out, have you?
Hm, that was below my expectations.
You’ve done an excellent job holding out against me for so long. Too bad, though.
You should be better prepared the next time we meet, kid?
You’re pretty good. It’s been a long time since I got so much pressure in a fight.
My, and you sounded so confident… Is this really the best you could do?
Well… It’s no surprise that you’re here.
I’ve seen you a few times before, so…
Even with a being like that, there was no difference.
Haha… Interesting for sure…
I thought things would be different this time.
I can’t really consider you to be the same being that Kali was, can I?
Let’s see if you remember my teachings… Care to show me?
Kali. Your pupils were certainly a bit tricky to deal with.
You remember it well…
Figured your strength wouldn’t be the same as before…
Uh-uh, stay still, and don’t peep a word.
You’re doing pretty alright, I see.
Was that really your best?
…Yeah. You’ve shown me that sending you here was worth my while.
C’mon, now… You’ve gotten a lot softer.
Indeed. I know of you as well.
As expected… I cannot help but be astonished.
Her prowess was simply too great for you to endure.
Tis alright. Be relieved in your rest.
You held out for an impressive duration, still.
…I won’t bother saying pointless stuff.
…She’s strong. And something about her is similar to me…
The rest of you can bear this for longer, right?
…A Color isn’t all that different.
Don’t get impatient. You’ll only make more mistakes that way.
…Hah.
…If you came here to see me ‘cause you were worried, it was wasted effort.
…Don’t be discouraged.
Let’s push on.
